name: AddCollaboratorToAirtableInterface
description:
Add a collaborator to an Airtable interface.

This tool is used to add a new collaborator to a specific interface in Airtable. Call this when you need to give a user access to an interface within a particular base.

parameters.name: airtable_base_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Airtable base where the interface is located. This helps specify which base the collaborator will be added to.

parameters.name: page_bundle_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific interface page bundle where the collaborator will be added.

parameters.name: collaborator_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the collaborator to add. Include type (individual or group) and relevant details. Only one collaborator can be added at a time.

collaborators.description: This endpoint accepts two types of collaborators: **individual user** and **group**. This route currently supports adding only one collaborator at a time.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the airtable API.

collaborators.description: This endpoint accepts two types of collaborators: **individual user** and **group**. This route currently supports adding only one collaborator at a time.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
